TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed VARKIND extends System.Enum

remarks.format:
## Remarks For additional information about `VARKIND`, see the MSDN Library.
The common language runtime throws an exception when a COM method in native code returns an HRESULT. For more information, see [How to: Map HRESULTs and Exceptions](../Topic/How%20to:%20Map%20HRESULTs%20and%20Exceptions.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.VARKIND VAR_CONST = int32(2)

Docs.summary: The structure describes a symbolic constant. There is no memory associated with it.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.VARKIND VAR_DISPATCH = int32(3)

Docs.summary: The variable can be accessed only through .

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.VARKIND VAR_PERINSTANCE = int32(0)

Docs.summary: The variable is a field or member of the type. It exists at a fixed offset within each instance of the type.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.VARKIND VAR_STATIC = int32(1)

Docs.summary: There is only one instance of the variable.
